work_items.title: Deliver measurable sprint objective outcome
work_items.description: Feature description with objective context, constraints, and expected outcome.
acceptance_criteria: Given valid prerequisites, when feature work is completed, then expected outcome is achieved.

work_items.title: Enable a specific user-facing capability
work_items.description: User story description with clear capability and constraints.
acceptance_criteria: Given preconditions, when the user performs the action, then the expected result occurs.
